augment(bool,IController,address,address.notice: Destroy {consumed item} to augment given {item}. There is a chance of 30% that the item will be destroyed instead of augmentation.

reduceEquippedItemsDurability(IControlle.notice: Reduce durability of all equipped items except items of SKILL-type.

repairDurability(bool,IController,addres.notice: Destroy {consumed item} to repair durability of the {item}

use(bool,IController,address,address,uin.notice: Use consumable item to temporally increase bonus attributes and destroy the item
